data.comment: The match is underway in Santos.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Santos.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Santos Santos drive forward through Marinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 3, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Yeferson Soteldo for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 5, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Santos throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Flamengo drives forward and Gabriel Barbosa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 8, Flamengo's Michael misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos just outside Flamengo's area.
In the minute 9, Marinho (Santos) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 15, Raniel of Santos is pulled up for offside.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Santos.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Santos.
Gabriel Barbosa (Flamengo) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Gerson is back on the pitch.
In the minute 27, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gerson for Flamengo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 28, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Filipe Luis (Flamengo) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 30, Marinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Santos to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 31, Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 33, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
Rene for Flamengo has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Santos's Felipe Jonatan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
In the minute 34, Santos's Diego Pituca breaks free at Urbano Caldeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 35, Free kick Santos.
Felipe Jonatan for Santos drives towards goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Santos's Raniel gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Filipe Luis is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 36, Filipe Luis has recovered and rejoins the match in Santos.
Flamengo's Gabriel Barbosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 39, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Urbano Caldeira, Para has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 39, Flamengo's Gerson has been booked in Santos.
Santos have a dangerous throw-in.
Michael for Flamengo drives towards goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Flamengo's Gabriel Barbosa is whistled for offside at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 45, Santos drive forward but Marinho is judged offside.
9 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Santos to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Flamengo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 45, Luan Peres (Santos) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 45, Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Santos Santos attack through Marinho. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 45, Jobson (Santos) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Gabriel Barbosa.
Gabriel Barbosa (Flamengo) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Michael (Flamengo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gabriel Barbosa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 50, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Marinho for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 56, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 57, Free kick Santos.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Santos.
Flamengo's Bruno Henrique has been booked in Santos and will miss the next match through suspension.
Para (Santos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Santos Santos attack through Para. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 59, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In Santos Santos drive forward through Yeferson Soteldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 61, Marinho of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Urbano Caldeira.
Lucas Verissimo (Santos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Santos.
Santos's Raniel gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Santos.
Domenec Torrent Font is making the team's first substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Cesar replacing Diego Alves.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In Santos, Marinho of Santos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 65, Carlos Sanchez for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Everton Ribeiro is replacing Bruno Henrique for Flamengo at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 65, Domenec Torrent Font (Flamengo) is making a third substitution, with Mauricio Isla replacing Rene.
The away team have replaced Gerson with Willian Arao. This is the fourth substitution made today by Domenec Torrent Font.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 67, Flamengo are pushing forward but Gabriel Barbosa's finish is wide of the goal.
Santos have a goal kick.
Flamengo are coming forward and Gabriel Barbosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Raniel for Santos is whistled offside.
Cuca (Santos) is making a first substitution, with Jean Mota replacing Jobson.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 71, Santos make their second substitution with Lucas Braga replacing Carlos Sanchez.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 73, Flamengo needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Flamengo throw-in in Santos's half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gabriel Barbosa.
In the minute 75, Diego (Flamengo) has replaced the possibly injured Gabriel Barbosa.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Flamengo throw-in in Santos's half.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Flamengo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Kaio Jorge is on a sub for Raniel for Santos.
Santos are coming forward and Jean Mota gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Willian Arao (Flamengo) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos's Lucas Braga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 82, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Santos to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Ivonei is replacing Felipe Jonatan for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Urbano Caldeira.
Lucas Verissimo is booked for the home team.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Free kick Flamengo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
Mauricio Isla (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Santos.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio will wait an extra 7 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Flamengo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Ivonei of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Santos. The final score is 0-1.
Ivonei (Santos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
